name: queue-manager
title: QueuePilot - Build Queue Manager Mini-App
spec: Telegram mini-app for Dave to manage the app build queue from his phone. Features: (1) Dashboard view showing all queued apps with color-coded status chips (pending=gray, in_progress=blue, done=green, blocked=red). (2) Tap any app to see full spec, notes, timestamps. (3) Drag-to-reorder priorities. (4) Add new app idea: title, spec, target price, priority ÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂ appended to queue.json. (5) Live status: see what Kishbrac is currently building. (6) Approve/reject completed builds with notes. This is a pure frontend mini-app ÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂ reads/writes queue.json and infrastructure.json via GitHub API (use PAT from .env). No backend needed.

name: telescheduler
title: TeleScheduler - Recurring Message Scheduler
spec: Bot + mini-app for scheduling recurring messages to Telegram groups. Features: timezone support, message templates, content queue, cron-style recurrence (daily/weekly/custom). Mini-app UI for managing schedules. Group admins add bot, configure via mini-app.
users: Telegram community managers, crypto group admins, educators

name: gatebot
title: GateBot - Paid Community Access Manager
spec: Stripe-connected bot that auto-admits users to private groups after payment and auto-kicks on subscription cancellation. Mini-app for: payment checkout (Telegram Payments API or Stripe link), subscription management, admin dashboard showing active members and revenue. Webhook-driven.
users: Paid community owners, course creators, premium group admins

name: dripflow
title: DripFlow - Drip Content Sequences
spec: Bot that delivers scheduled content sequences triggered by join date. Course creators define lessons as a sequence, new members get Day 1 content on join, Day 2 next day, etc. Mini-app for: creating/editing sequences, viewing student progress, managing content. Supports text, images, files, quizzes.
users: Telegram-based course creators, educators, onboarding managers

name: invoice-tracker
title: InvoiceTrack - Invoice Follow-Up from Telegram
spec: Mini-app for freelancers to track invoices and auto-send follow-up reminders. Add invoice details (client, amount, due date), set escalating reminder schedule (day 3, 7, 14, 30). Bot sends you reminders to follow up, optionally sends polite reminder messages to client Telegram contacts. Dashboard shows outstanding/paid/overdue.
users: Freelancers who communicate with clients on Telegram

name: appointment-reminders
title: BookPing - Appointment Reminders
spec: Bot for service businesses to send appointment reminders to clients via Telegram. Mini-app for: adding appointments (client, date/time, service), configuring reminder timing (24hr, 1hr before), client confirmation buttons. Clients tap confirm/reschedule directly in chat. Calendar view in mini-app.
users: Service businesses (salons, clinics, tutors) especially non-US markets

name: workout-builder
title: FitPlan - Workout Builder & Sharer
spec: Mini-app for personal trainers to build workout plans and share with clients in-chat. Exercise library with sets/reps/rest, drag-to-reorder, branded PDF export via bot message. Clients open mini-app to see today's workout with timer, log completion. Trainer sees client progress.
users: Personal trainers with Telegram client groups

name: receipt-expense
title: SnapExpense - Receipt Scanner & Categorizer
spec: Send a photo of a receipt to the bot, it extracts amount/vendor/date and categorizes it. Mini-app dashboard shows spending by category, monthly totals, exportable CSV for tax time. Uses Telegram's native photo sharing ÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂ zero friction capture.
users: Small business owners, freelancers tracking expenses

name: standup-bot
title: StandupTG - Daily Standup Bot
spec: Bot DMs team members 3 configurable standup questions at scheduled time. Collects responses, posts formatted summary to group. Mini-app for: configuring questions, schedule, viewing history, team analytics. Flat pricing, not per-user.

name: action-extractor
title: ActionPull - Meeting Notes to Action Items
spec: Paste or forward meeting notes to the bot, it extracts action items with owners and deadlines. Mini-app shows action item dashboard, tracks completion, sends deadline reminders. Share action lists to group chats.

name: link-in-bio
title: BioLinks - Link-in-Bio with Email Capture
spec: Mini-app that generates a shareable link-in-bio page. Add links, social profiles, email capture form. Manage everything from within Telegram. Page hosted on GitHub Pages. Share your bio link anywhere ÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂ Telegram profile, Instagram, etc.
users: Creators on Instagram/TikTok/Telegram who want a simple bio page

name: review-requester
title: ReviewPush - Google Review Request Bot
spec: Bot for local businesses to request Google reviews from customers via Telegram. After a visit/service, business sends review request through bot. Customer gets a friendly message with direct link to leave a Google review. Track who's been asked, who completed, follow-up non-responders.

name: doc-collector
title: DocDrop - Client Document Collection
spec: Bot for bookkeepers/accountants to collect documents from clients. Create a checklist of needed docs (W2, receipts, bank statements), share collection link or bot with client. Client sends docs via Telegram, bot organizes and tracks what's received vs outstanding. Sends reminders for missing docs.
users: Solo bookkeepers, accountants, lawyers collecting client docs
